titleStmt.title: SII 14.227: original edition by A. S. Ramanatha Ayyar
No. 227. (A.R. No. 18 of 1929.) ŚIVAPURI, TIRUPPATTUR TALUK, RAMANATHAPURAM DISTRICT. ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE SECOND prākāra IN THE SVAYAMPRAKĀŚA TEMPLE.

summary.p: Dated in the 10th year of the king, this record of Śrīvallabha without any distinguishing attributes, registers the gift of land in a plot called Tokkaḷivayal by a certain lady Pañjan Uyyavandāḷ of Aruviyūr for a lamp to be burnt in the temple of Tiruttāndōṉṟīśvaram-Uḍaiyār.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
tiripuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīvallavatevaṟku yāṇṭu pattāvatu
keraḷaciṅkavaḷanāṭṭu piramateyam śrīnirupacekaraccaruppetimaṅkalattu tiruttānto
ṉṟiccuvaramuṭaiya paramacuvāmikaḷukku Aruviyūrirukkum veḷḷāṭṭi pañcan Uyya
vantāḷ Ittevaṟkku Oru tirunuṉtāviḷakku cantirātittavaṟ celvatāka ko
ṇṭu kuṭutta pūmi tokkaḷi vayalil Iluppai cey teṟkku Itukku me
lil palataṭi nilam Orumāvum koṇṭu cantirātittavaṟ celvatāka koṇṭu kuṭut ten ..
Digital edition of SII 14.227 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
